Help.Description: This command rings the terminal bell. It's obsolete and should be avoided, instead use #showme {\a} to send the terminal alarm character to the terminal.
Help.Example: This could be useful if you aren't watching the screen and don't want to miss out on a conversation with Bubba. Alternatively you can use '#system' to play a sound file.
Help.Notes: Some terminals will allow you to use VT100 Operating System Commands to change the terminal's icon name which can be used as a visual alert.
